startscreen.connectionmsg: Your adventure begins here, please log in or register.

signinscreen.title: sign in
signinscreen.titlemsg: Please enter your phone number and password to log in

signupscreen.title: Registration
signupscreen.titlemsg: Please complete this form to create your account
signupscreen.noemptytel: The telephone number cannot be empty
signupscreen.accountalreadyexist: An account already exist with this number

telVerificationcreen.title: Vérification de votre numéro de télephone
telVerificationcreen.titlemsg: Please enter the code received by SMS to your number
telVerificationcreen.novalidcode: the code entered is not valid
telVerificationcreen.coderenewmessage: the verification code has been renew successfully

identitycreen.title: Complete votre Profil
identitycreen.titlemsg: Please fill out this form to complete your profile

emailscreen.title: Submit your email address (2FA)
emailscreen.titlemsg: Your email address is necessary to be used as a second authentication factor if necessary.

sponsorship.title: Get sponsored by a member
sponsorship.titlemsg: The app was recommended to you by a member. Please search for their profile and add them as a referrer

countryScreen.title: Let's start with your country and city
countryScreen.titlemsg: Please choose your country and city of residence

passwordRecover.title: password recovery
passwordRecover.titlemsg: Please enter your  phone number used during the authentication
passwordRecover.titlemsgverif: Please enter the code received by SMS or by email
passwordRecover.titlemsgnewpassword: Please enter the code received by SMS or by email

photoProfilScreen.title: Add a profil photo
photoProfilScreen.titlemsg: Please choose a profile photo to allow your correspondents to identify you

kyc.declationtext:
I hereby declare that the information provided in this form is accurate and complete.
 I confirm that any information is found incorrect and/or incomplete that leads a violation of regulations may initiate legal actions, and I accept that I am the responsible party for any and all charges, penalties and violations.
kyc.successmsg: Thank you for submitting your information. We will examine them shortly.

signoutConfirmMessage: Do you really want to log out ?
